SELECT id, house_info_id AS houseInfoId, deal_year AS dealYear, deal_month AS dealMonth, deal_day AS dealDay, contract_type AS contractType, deal_amount AS dealAmount, monthly_rent AS monthlyRent, exclusive_area AS exclusiveArea, floor FROM villa_deal WHERE 1 = 1
AND house_info_id IN ( SELECT id FROM house_info WHERE house_type = #{buildingType} )
AND contract_type = #{contractType}
AND house_info_id IN ( SELECT id FROM house_info WHERE sigungu_code = #{sgg} )
AND house_info_id IN ( SELECT id FROM house_info WHERE emd_code = #{emd} )
LIMIT 10

SELECT id, house_info_id AS houseInfoId, deal_year AS dealYear, deal_month AS dealMonth, deal_day AS dealDay, contract_type AS contractType, deal_amount AS dealAmount, monthly_rent AS monthlyRent, exclusive_area AS exclusiveArea, floor FROM villa_deal WHERE house_info_id = #{houseInfoId}
